shortDescription: Your intelligent household assistant with human-like capabilities
detailedDescription: The RoboMaid X2000 is a state-of-the-art humanoid robot designed to handle all your household cleaning needs with unprecedented precision and care.

faq.question: How long does it take to learn my home layout?
faq.answer: RoboMaid X2000 creates a detailed 3D map of your home within 24 hours of activation.

faq.question: Can it handle pets in the house?
faq.answer: Yes, our advanced AI recognizes and safely works around pets, even cleaning pet hair and feeding them if requested.

faq.question: What happens if it malfunctions?
faq.answer: 24/7 emergency support is included, with same-day repair service in most locations.
